00005 @page crypto_sec Crypto API
00006 @section sha1sub SHA1
00007 The following functions perform the SHA1 Hash computation
00008     - SHA1()
00009     - SHA1_Init()
00010     - SHA1_Update()
00011     - SHA1_Final()
00012     
00013 Following SHA APIs support multiple calls. For multiple call documentation
00014 please check sha directory.
00015     - SHA256()
00016     - SHA224()
00017     - SHA384()
00018     - SHA512()
00019 @section md5sub  MD5
00020 The following functions perform the MD5 Hash computation
00021     - MD5()
00022     - MD5_Init()
00023     - MD5_Update()
00024     - MD5_Final()
00025 @section hmacsub HMAC
00026 The following functions perform the HMAC Hash computation
00027     - HMAC()
00028     - HMAC_Init()
00029     - HMAC_Update()
00030     - HMAC_Final()
00031 @section dessub DES and 3DES Encryption/Decryption
00032 The following functions can be used for DES Encryption/Decryption
00033     - DES_set_key_checked()
00034     - DES_ede3_cbc_encrypt()
00035     - DES_ncbc_encrypt()
00036 @section aessub AES Encryption/Decryption
00037 The following functions can be used for AES Encryption/Decryption
00038     - AES_set_encrypt_key()
00039     - AES_set_decrypt_key()
00040     - AES_cbc_encrypt()
00041 
00042 AES Counter mode
00043     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt()
00044     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt()
00045 
00046 For Multiple call support 
00047     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt_init() 
00048     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt_update()
00049     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt_final()
00050     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt_init()
00051     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt_update()
00052     - cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt_final()
00053

00056     - LRW_AES_ctx_encrypt()
00057     - LRW_AES_ctx_decrypt()
00058     
00059 @section rc4sub RC4
00060 The following functions perform the RC4 Operations
00061     - RC4_set_key()
00062     - RC4()
00063 @section dsasub DSA
00064 The following functions perform the DSA Operations
00065     - DSA_generate_parameters()
00066     - DSA_generate_key()

00073     - RSA_generate_key()
00074     - RSA_sign()
00075     - RSA_verify()

00077     - RSA_private_decrypt()
00078     - RSA_private_encrypt()
00079     - RSA_public_decrypt()
00080 @section dhsub DH
00081 The following functions perform the Diffie-Hellman Operations
00082     - DH_generate_parameters()
00083     - DH_generate_key()
00084     - DH_compute_key()
00085 @section mesub ModExp
00086 The following function perform Modular Exponentiation
00087     - cvm_ModExp() 
00088 @section aesxcbc AES XCBC
00089     - cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac()

00091

00095     - cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_final()

00098     - cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_prf128_final()
00099 @section aesgcm AES GCM

00103 For Multiple call support

00106     - AES_GCM_ctx_encrypt()
00107     - AES_GCM_ctx_decrypt()
00108 @section gapisub Generic API
00109 The following functions provide the abstraction layer to the crypto API
00110     - dh_generate_key_pair()
